 2010-15112010-12-02,  ,  TC,  CPC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Services and Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL SERVICES AND FEES REGULATIONS, by increasing the rate charged for registered mail delivered in Canada, effective January 17, 2011. The amendments implement a $0.15 increase, to $8.10, for registered mail delivered in Canada (an increase of 1.9 %).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0287 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
